definition: transcription/to make a copy of a recording
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: That is especially true for antiretroviral therapy.
sentences.chinese: 这些对于反转录酶疗法的确相当正确。

sentences.english: It is well known that the processes of transcription and translation are coupled in prokaryotes.
sentences.chinese: 原核生物转录与翻译过程是耦联的。

sentences.english: These results indicate that the yeast transcriptome is more complex than previously appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 这些结果表明酵母转录组比以前描述的更复杂。

sentences.english: Transcriptionally active regions are replicated first.
The genetic material then transcribes the thought-form into physicality, which is known as form.
sentences.chinese: 随后基因材料把思想形态转录到肉体性，即形体。

sentences.english: The research on suppression of gene transcription by polyamide was reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文总结了聚酰胺对特定基因转录抑制的研究进展。

sentences.english: Okay, I am very glad to be here and I am ready to transcribe this message.
sentences.chinese: 对，我很高兴我在这儿，我已准备好转录讯息。

sentences.english: The intention of ART is to decrease this viral load.
sentences.chinese: 抗逆转录病毒的目的就是降低病毒载量。

sentences.english: Antiretroviral drugs are used in the treatment and prevention of HIV infection.
sentences.chinese: 抗逆转录病毒药物用于治疗和预防艾滋病毒感染。

sentences.english: There is a hypermethylation sequential basis in the upstream region from the transcriptional start site of IRX1 gene.
sentences.chinese: IRX1基因转录起始点上游存在高甲基化结构基础。

sentences.english: In addition, it possesses action-at-a-distance and reverse transcriptase activity.
sentences.chinese: 此外，它还具有“超距作用”和反转录活性。

sentences.english: One of the disadvantages of this method is that you are totally strange to the transcriber .
sentences.chinese: 这种方法的一个缺点是你对转录器完全不熟悉。

sentences.english: Role of hTERT in apoptosis of cervical cancer induced by histone deacetylase inhibitor.
sentences.chinese: 人端粒酶逆转录酶在宫颈癌组织中的表达及意义。

sentences.english: The aim was to explore whether the CBF transcriptional activator gene existed in Adonis amurensis.
sentences.chinese: 探索CBF转录激活因子基因在侧金盏花中是否存在。

sentences.english: In the primary transcript neighbouring exons are separated by introns.
sentences.chinese: 在主要转录过程附近，表现子会被介入子所分开。

sentences.english: The DNA sequence that provides the signal to cease transcription is called a terminator.
sentences.chinese: 提供转录终止信号的DNA顺序称为终止子。

pinyin: xin4 shi3 he2 tang2 he2 suan1

definition: base pairing (e.g. adenine A 腺嘌呤 pairs with thymine T 胸腺嘧啶 in DNA)/base pair
